annotations:
From our close Owners, we can develop for sale the following laker:
MV " FEDERAL HUDSON "
---------------------
DWT 36,563 on 10.75m Built 2000 OSHIMA SHIPBUILDING CO LTD
Flag MAI, Class DNV NV - SS 9/2026 DD 9/2024
LOA 199.99m / Beam 23.76m / LBP 191.00m / Depth 14.85m
6 Holds / 6 Hatches, Grain 44,077cbm / Bale 42,282cbm
B&W 6S46MC-C 10,714 BHP 129 RPM
Gear 3x30t cr
Will load Thunder Bay, Canada for discharge Oristano, Italy 23 Sep to 03 Oct
Can deliver Med Oct
IDWAL report from May available for purchase at USD 1,500
Seller's terms can be released to named parties
BWTS ftd (Optamarin - UV)
Lakes Ftd
Ice Class 1C
+++
Can guide on price and provide full info
Pleased to hear
Best regards
George Kaklamanos
